Quick about me

Grew up in Louisiana - through college. Finished with a degree in Philosophy and a bunch 'ah debt. Worked. Started programming around 2011. Just for fun at first. Started learning ruby on rails. Good time. Went to school for it. More good times. Started learning front end tech. JS, jQuery, and angular. Hit my stride doing MERN stack development. Really liked react. Several years in now, and learning new things daily. I also run a youtube channel, check it out.
